articles.description: Vidya Balan's short film Natkhat, which marked her debut as a producer won the Best Of India Short Film Festival 2020, which makes it eligible to be India's Oscar entry for the year.
articles.content:
Natkhat, starring and co-produced by Vidya Balan, has won top prize at the third edition of Best Of India Short Film Festival 2020, which makes it eligible for Oscar nomination.

articles.title: Ajay Devgn to Direct Amitabh Bachchan in Upcoming Film 'Mayday' - The Quint
articles.description: Amitabh Bachchan and Ajay Devgn have teamed up for a new film titled Mayday, as per a report by Mumbai Mirror. The Tanhaji actor will be directing Big B for the first time, the report states.
articles.content:
Devgn's upcoming projects include RRR, Golmaal 5 and Maidaan, while Amitabh Bachchan has Ayan Mukerji's Brahmastra, Nagraj Manjule's Jhund and Rumi Jaffery's Chehre
 in his kitty. Bachchan and Devgn… [+104 chars]

articles.description: Currently lodged in Taloja Central Jail in Raigad, Showik Chakraborty has pointed out how he had been falsely implicated in the Sushant Singh Rajput case and that no drugs were seized from him during the investigations.
